user_prompt:
Create a modern, trust-building, and mobile-friendly landing page for my Real Estate Agency.
The page must have exactly 3 sections: Hero, Benefits, and Testimonials.
Across the page, integrate videos, image galleries, and 1 interactive widget.
All assets must be sourced from Freepik only.

🎨 Design System
Font Family: Montserrat (headings) + Open Sans (body) – professional yet friendly

Primary Color: Deep Blue #0D47A1

Secondary Color: Warm Gold #FFD54F

Background Color: Soft Light Gray #F8F9FA

Icon Style: Outline property icons (house, location pin, handshake) in blue and gold

Button Style: Rectangular with subtle shadow and hover color shift

Image Style: High-resolution, natural daylight shots of properties and happy homeowners

Widget: “Property Finder” — filters by location, budget range, and property type, returning curated listings in a pop-up or inline section

1️⃣ Hero Section
Background Video: Drone footage of premium homes, city skylines, or cozy neighborhoods

Overlaid with:

Headline (e.g., “Find Your Dream Home Today”)

Subheadline (e.g., “From luxury apartments to family houses — we’ve got it all.”)

Primary CTA Button: “Search Properties” (opens the Property Finder widget)

Secondary CTA Button: “Contact an Agent”

Beneath headline: Mini image gallery with 3–4 featured listings (each with thumbnail, price, and location tag)

2️⃣ Benefits Section
Two-column layout:

Left Column: Image gallery showing modern interiors, happy families, and property handovers

Right Column:

Headline: “Why Choose Us?”

List 4 Key Benefits with icons (e.g., “Verified Listings”, “Local Market Expertise”, “Fast Closing Process”, “Flexible Financing”)

Between every 2 benefits, insert short looping video snippets (e.g., agent showing a property, signing contracts)

Include a small floating “Property Finder” widget button so users can start searching at any point

3️⃣ Testimonials Section
Slider layout:

4–5 testimonials from satisfied clients (star ratings, profile photos, short quotes)

Mix of portrait shots and video testimonials for authenticity

Background: Full-width property photo with subtle overlay for readability

Final CTA: “Let’s Find Your Home” + Button linking back to the Property Finder widget

section_descriptions.Hero: Background Video: Drone footage of premium homes, city skylines, or cozy neighborhoods. Overlaid with: Headline (e.g., 'Find Your Dream Home Today'), Subheadline (e.g., 'From luxury apartments to family houses — we’ve got it all.'). Primary CTA Button: 'Search Properties' (opens the Property Finder widget), Secondary CTA Button: 'Contact an Agent'. Beneath headline: Mini image gallery with 3–4 featured listings (each with thumbnail, price, and location tag).
section_descriptions.Benefits: Two-column layout: Left Column: Image gallery showing modern interiors, happy families, and property handovers. Right Column: Headline: 'Why Choose Us?', List 4 Key Benefits with icons (e.g., 'Verified Listings', 'Local Market Expertise', 'Fast Closing Process', 'Flexible Financing'). Between every 2 benefits, insert short looping video snippets (e.g., agent showing a property, signing contracts). Include a small floating 'Property Finder' widget button so users can start searching at any point.
section_descriptions.Testimonials: Slider layout: 4–5 testimonials from satisfied clients (star ratings, profile photos, short quotes). Mix of portrait shots and video testimonials for authenticity. Background: Full-width property photo with subtle overlay for readability. Final CTA: 'Let’s Find Your Home' + Button linking back to the Property Finder widget.

theme.button_style: Rectangular with subtle shadow and hover color shift
theme.image_style: High-resolution, natural daylight shots of properties and happy homeowners

features: returns curated listings in a pop-up or inline section

Create a modern, trust-building, and mobile-friendly landing page for my Real Estate Agency.
The page must have exactly 3 sections: Hero, Benefits, and Testimonials.
Across the page, integrate videos, image galleries, and 1 interactive widget.
All assets must be sourced from Freepik only.

🎨 Design System
Font Family: Montserrat (headings) + Open Sans (body) – professional yet friendly

Primary Color: Deep Blue #0D47A1

Secondary Color: Warm Gold #FFD54F

Background Color: Soft Light Gray #F8F9FA

Icon Style: Outline property icons (house, location pin, handshake) in blue and gold

Button Style: Rectangular with subtle shadow and hover color shift

Image Style: High-resolution, natural daylight shots of properties and happy homeowners

Widget: “Property Finder” — filters by location, budget range, and property type, returning curated listings in a pop-up or inline section

1️⃣ Hero Section
Background Video: Drone footage of premium homes, city skylines, or cozy neighborhoods

Overlaid with:

Headline (e.g., “Find Your Dream Home Today”)

Subheadline (e.g., “From luxury apartments to family houses — we’ve got it all.”)

Primary CTA Button: “Search Properties” (opens the Property Finder widget)

Secondary CTA Button: “Contact an Agent”

Beneath headline: Mini image gallery with 3–4 featured listings (each with thumbnail, price, and location tag)

2️⃣ Benefits Section
Two-column layout:

Left Column: Image gallery showing modern interiors, happy families, and property handovers

Right Column:

Headline: “Why Choose Us?”

List 4 Key Benefits with icons (e.g., “Verified Listings”, “Local Market Expertise”, “Fast Closing Process”, “Flexible Financing”)

Between every 2 benefits, insert short looping video snippets (e.g., agent showing a property, signing contracts)

Include a small floating “Property Finder” widget button so users can start searching at any point

3️⃣ Testimonials Section
Slider layout:

4–5 testimonials from satisfied clients (star ratings, profile photos, short quotes)

Mix of portrait shots and video testimonials for authenticity

Background: Full-width property photo with subtle overlay for readability

Final CTA: “Let’s Find Your Home” + Button linking back to the Property Finder widget

Overlaid with: Headline (e.g., 'Find Your Dream Home Today'), Subheadline (e.g., 'From luxury apartments to family houses — we’ve got it all.'). Primary CTA Button: 'Search Properties' (opens the Property Finder widget), Secondary CTA Button: 'Contact an Agent'. Beneath headline: Mini image gallery with 3–4 featured listings (each with thumbnail, price, and location tag).

Between every 2 benefits, insert short looping video snippets (e.g., agent showing a property, signing contracts). Include a small floating 'Property Finder' widget button so users can start searching at any point.
section_descriptions.Testimonials: Slider layout: 4–5 testimonials from satisfied clients (star ratings, profile photos, short quotes). Mix of portrait shots and video testimonials for authenticity. Background: Full-width property photo with subtle overlay for readability. Final CTA: 'Let’s Find Your Home' + Button linking back to the Property Finder widget.

user_prompt:
Create a modern, trust-building, and mobile-friendly landing page for my Real Estate Agency.
The page must have exactly 3 sections: Hero, Benefits, and Testimonials.
Across the page, integrate videos, image galleries, and 1 interactive widget.
All assets must be sourced from Freepik only.

🎨 Design System
Font Family: Montserrat (headings) + Open Sans (body) – professional yet friendly

Primary Color: Deep Blue #0D47A1

Secondary Color: Warm Gold #FFD54F

Background Color: Soft Light Gray #F8F9FA

Icon Style: Outline property icons (house, location pin, handshake) in blue and gold

Button Style: Rectangular with subtle shadow and hover color shift

Image Style: High-resolution, natural daylight shots of properties and happy homeowners

Widget: “Property Finder” — filters by location, budget range, and property type, returning curated listings in a pop-up or inline section

1️⃣ Hero Section
Background Video: Drone footage of premium homes, city skylines, or cozy neighborhoods

Overlaid with:

Headline (e.g., “Find Your Dream Home Today”)

Subheadline (e.g., “From luxury apartments to family houses — we’ve got it all.”)

Primary CTA Button: “Search Properties” (opens the Property Finder widget)

Secondary CTA Button: “Contact an Agent”

Beneath headline: Mini image gallery with 3–4 featured listings (each with thumbnail, price, and location tag)

2️⃣ Benefits Section
Two-column layout:

Left Column: Image gallery showing modern interiors, happy families, and property handovers

Right Column:

Headline: “Why Choose Us?”

List 4 Key Benefits with icons (e.g., “Verified Listings”, “Local Market Expertise”, “Fast Closing Process”, “Flexible Financing”)

Between every 2 benefits, insert short looping video snippets (e.g., agent showing a property, signing contracts)

Include a small floating “Property Finder” widget button so users can start searching at any point

3️⃣ Testimonials Section
Slider layout:

4–5 testimonials from satisfied clients (star ratings, profile photos, short quotes)

Mix of portrait shots and video testimonials for authenticity

Background: Full-width property photo with subtle overlay for readability

Final CTA: “Let’s Find Your Home” + Button linking back to the Property Finder widget

Hero.background: Background Video: Drone footage of premium homes, city skylines, or cozy neighborhoods

overlay_content.example: From luxury apartments to family houses — we’ve got it all.

overlay_content.details: 3–4 featured listings (each with thumbnail, price, and location tag)

left_column.content: modern interiors, happy families, and property handovers

floating_widget.description: small floating button to start searching at any point

content.details: from satisfied clients (star ratings, profile photos, short quotes)
Mix of portrait shots and video testimonials for authenticity

Testimonials.background: Full-width property photo with subtle overlay for readability

button.label: linked back to the Property Finder widget

user_prompt:
Create a modern, trust-building, and mobile-friendly landing page for my Real Estate Agency.
The page must have exactly 3 sections: Hero, Benefits, and Testimonials.
Across the page, integrate videos, image galleries, and 1 interactive widget.
All assets must be sourced from Freepik only.

🎨 Design System
Font Family: Montserrat (headings) + Open Sans (body) – professional yet friendly

Primary Color: Deep Blue #0D47A1

Secondary Color: Warm Gold #FFD54F

Background Color: Soft Light Gray #F8F9FA

Icon Style: Outline property icons (house, location pin, handshake) in blue and gold

Button Style: Rectangular with subtle shadow and hover color shift

Image Style: High-resolution, natural daylight shots of properties and happy homeowners

Widget: “Property Finder” — filters by location, budget range, and property type, returning curated listings in a pop-up or inline section

1️⃣ Hero Section
Background Video: Drone footage of premium homes, city skylines, or cozy neighborhoods

Overlaid with:

Headline (e.g., “Find Your Dream Home Today”)

Subheadline (e.g., “From luxury apartments to family houses — we’ve got it all.”)

Primary CTA Button: “Search Properties” (opens the Property Finder widget)

Secondary CTA Button: “Contact an Agent”

Beneath headline: Mini image gallery with 3–4 featured listings (each with thumbnail, price, and location tag)

2️⃣ Benefits Section
Two-column layout:

Left Column: Image gallery showing modern interiors, happy families, and property handovers

Right Column:

Headline: “Why Choose Us?”

List 4 Key Benefits with icons (e.g., “Verified Listings”, “Local Market Expertise”, “Fast Closing Process”, “Flexible Financing”)

Between every 2 benefits, insert short looping video snippets (e.g., agent showing a property, signing contracts)

Include a small floating “Property Finder” widget button so users can start searching at any point

3️⃣ Testimonials Section
Slider layout:

4–5 testimonials from satisfied clients (star ratings, profile photos, short quotes)

Mix of portrait shots and video testimonials for authenticity

Background: Full-width property photo with subtle overlay for readability

Final CTA: “Let’s Find Your Home” + Button linking back to the Property Finder widget
